level.heading: Status report.
level.text: The Mayor shall submit a status report by January 1, 2011, and on January 1 of each year thereafter, to the Council, which shall include the:
Outcome of the care provided for each surrendered newborn; and
Number and disposition of cases of surrendered newborns.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 107 of Newborn Safe Haven Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-321, March 1, 2010, 57 DCR 1842).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-158
level.text: For Law 18-158, see notes following ยง 4-1451.01.
